website_summaries.verdict: This camera-equipped, smartphone- and tablet-controlled quadricopter is worth checking out if you want to spend some cash on a fun gadget but don't just want the newest game system.
pros: Fairly easy to fly and perform stunts with
Mobile apps are useful and functional
cons: Short battery life like most remote-controlled flying toys
Physical controls are only available with an Nvidia Shield

customer_reviews.title: Must have grown up boys toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my partner. Mr Gadget who loves flying all things remote control. This is a massive success. He was so desperate to get this and it's everything it promised to be. It is controlled by our iPad, iPhone and Galaxy S3 Android. You can play games with it, you can film with it and watch back what you tape. There are a lot more games for the 1.0 version and hopefully they will migrate across for the 2.0 Drone too. It's easy to fly, easy to control and robust. This is definitely the gadget of the year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Considered purchase but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: yes this is a considered purchase, but wow. Love flying rc helis, got this out the box charged and flying no problems. Video paayback on your control device is clear, very stable and responsive. I agree with some other reviews I would have liked to get the power extreme model but cant see how they charge nearly 120 quid more for it. If you are wanting but are unsure of the outlay trust me its worth it, just dont tell anyone what you paid for it ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Paul T

customer_reviews.title: Terrific machine
customer_reviews.text: Having debated whether to get my 10 year old son an RC helicopter or Parrot Drone, am glad we chose the latter. It is very easy to handle and works well indoors and out. He can control it himself via his iPad mini or iTouch and it is highly responsive. The automated lander is a massive help and helps prevent crash landings.
customer_reviews.author: CAR

customer_reviews.title: everything looks good, but I never got to fly it because ...
customer_reviews.text: everything looks good, but I never got to fly it because I couldn't connect it to wifi, had my money returned
customer_reviews.author: odbob

customer_reviews.title: Not an AR Drone 2
customer_reviews.text: Be aware this is an AR Drone 1 in a AR Drone 2 hull. This unit does not have a USB port. The AR Drone 2 does. The batteries are for AR Drone 1. Very disappointed to learn that what I purchased is not what was advertised. It was only when I wanted some spares that I discovered this.
customer_reviews.author: M P DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little flying thing!
customer_reviews.text: Sent as a present to a friend, who is loving using it. Good video definition taken from it. Easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: jillymix

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he is thrilled with it . It works so well and does what it says on the tin !!
customer_reviews.author: Lavendersblue

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Amazing . worked straight out of box and flight was easy using ipad. kept indoor body on even outside which saved it from damage several times
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Big boys toys
customer_reviews.text: My son and husband have one each, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Ding

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: This thing is full of features, however, as the whole thing it is very average product. But battery doesn't last more then 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: great but there are better drones arriving on the market
customer_reviews.author: Netforce911

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for Christmas and was just exactly what was wanted and arrived on time despite being ordered Christmas week
customer_reviews.author: Carol F

customer_reviews.title: Parrot AR.Drone 2.0
customer_reviews.text: nice piece of kit, still tring to work out how to use the cameras properly, but i'm sure that's user error rather than the product......hopefully
customer_reviews.author: S. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, undamaged but could do with better wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 year old son - he absolutely loves it.. The only thing missing is a spare battery - which we will be buying later today :)
customer_reviews.author: supermum_of_3

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Does exactly what it says on the tin. Quick postage, good communication. A absolute pleasure to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: nicola sally bell

customer_reviews.title: Great fun to fly (Thanks, Stephen Fry)
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted something like this after seeing a "professional" one a few years ago being used to survey old buildings. Watching Stephen Fry flying this on a TV gadget programme, I actually paused the programme and ordered it straight away! Great fun to fly - hoping for some better weather soon, so I can get it outside more. Lost one star as the battery life is so short, but they have since announced a better battery is coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Adam

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant !!!
customer_reviews.text: The AR drone 2 from Parrot is simply amazing. It is ready to fly out of the packaging once once you have charged the battery. It gives about 10 minutes of flying time for each charge so I would recommend having a spare battery. The AR 2 is intuitive and simple to fly with the technology handling so much of the tricky stuff for you. In absolute flight mode this machine is just a dream to fly. The HD video recording gives excellent quality and a great record of your flight. This is about the best big boys toy you can get to work with your iPad! Ours of fun!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian0035

customer_reviews.title: Drone
customer_reviews.text: I was a little unsure on whether to go ahead a buy the Drone but eventually the other half told me to just get it so I stopped talking about it and at first I was still un sure that I had done the right thing but now that I have had some time playing with it and got used to it I think its great.
customer_reviews.author: Hailejon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...good images
customer_reviews.text: East to use once you down load the "app"....only negative is that polystyrene cover is a bit fragile and can be expensive to replace....on the other hand most spares are easily available...used it already to check the roof guttering (saved getting the ladders out)....
customer_reviews.author: Essay

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and as advertised,
customer_reviews.text: Great for taken pics and movies at altitude. wish it had further range but it is ok, and the flying time is limited to about ten mins so a secondary battery is essential. the blade protector for indoor use is crap and breaks very easily in multiple parts. and it is about £40 to replace which is out of order.
customer_reviews.author: commando

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic improvement over the Drone 1.0 Spare batteries a rip off, so buy 1300 3S packs from Hobbyking and change the plugs on them. Top notch toy, first class.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Philpott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and very easy to fly,recommend buying extra battery's for longer flying time.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie b

customer_reviews.title: great fun and amazing technology!
customer_reviews.text: The quad-copter is great fun! didnt have any problems flying it after about 10 mins of nervously not wanting to break a £260 toy!
customer_reviews.author: taran

customer_reviews.title: Do not touch with a barge pole!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially thrilled with this product, but after my iPad (which I use to control it) died and needed to be wiped, I went to re-download the software, and it was MISSING from the AppStore. There is a VERY limited replacement, without any of the advanced features (absolute control etc.). I tried speaking to tech support, who completely stonewalled me - NO reason on why they've removed the app, and NO idea on when they'll be a replacement - in fact TOTALLY UNHELPFUL and OBSTRUCTIVE. This product is only useful with its associated software, and if the manufacturers can't be bothered to supply that software, then there is no point in having the product. AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Dr D Harvey

customer_reviews.title: why it is not perfect and what you can do about it
customer_reviews.text: The ar drone is a great piece of hardware 8o) I love my quadrocopter. The price is very low and you can expect that parrot did everything to keep it on this level. Ball bearings could not be included in this price. You can feel this in the flight time... 7-8 Minutes with the normal bearings and the normal battery. I changed the bearings to the Ambideluxe speed bearings. Now i have round about 10 Minutes flight time with the standard battery!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K

customer_reviews.title: ar drone
customer_reviews.text: this parrot ar drone is a must have for any r/c enthusiasts it's durable lights and easy to control via smart fone or tablet. not only that easy to modify should u wish.
customer_reviews.author: j smith

customer_reviews.title: Apple software withdrawn
customer_reviews.text: Beware the Apple version of the control software has been withdrawn from the App Store due to a patent dispute. The replacement software does not have either Absolute Control or accelerometer mode - so you can't control the AR Drone by tilting your iPhone/iPad. Also this software is only available for iOS 6.
customer_reviews.author: towos

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Sadly within ten minutes of using this item the motor worked loose causing the entire unit to fail as it just flips over on three rotors. I had high hopes for it, but it appears to be too fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: IOS 6!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE ! ! ! ! YOU NEED IOS 6 TO USE THIS DRONE ON APPLE PRODUCTS!! i was just about to buy one and i saw i need ios 6 :( so now i cant do anything at all as i have a ipad 1 so now i wont be buying this amazing toy ! THANKS SO !"£"$"£!"$! MUCH PARROT
customer_reviews.author: K. Stoneman

product_meta.title: Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 with Outdoor Hull (Orange/ Blue)
product_meta.description:
Undoubtedly the ultimate flying toy, the AR.Drone 2.0 represents the latest development of Parrot's world renowned high tech quadricopter, that is easily controlled by Wi-Fi using a smartphone or tablet. It features a high definition camera with a video recording facility, plus flight data sharing, a patented piloting mode, and an innovative pressure sensor for increased stability at any altitude. Parrot’s outstanding AR.Drone 2.0 offers just about every possible option on the enthusiast's wish list, and can even perform 360 degree flips on command! 

HD 720p CAMERA: AR.Drone 2.0 is now equipped with an High definition front camera that will let the pilots see exactly what the AR.Drone 2.0 sees just as if they were in the pilot seat. Download the free AR.FreeFlight 2.0 application (available on the App Store and the Android market) and take control of the AR.Drone 2.0 in a split second. The user-friendly control interface will appear over the video feedback streamed straight from the AR.Drone 2.0 with no latency thanks to its self-generated WiFi network.

The automatic stabilization system of the AR.Drone 2.0 will ensure an image of high quality, whether indoors or outdoors even in light wind conditions. Whether on a Smartphone or a tablet the users will see a clean, crystal clear image right from the sky.

RECORD AND SHARE: AR.FreeFlight 2.0 also lets the user record video and pictures as he is piloting the AR.Drone 2.0. Simply press the record button to start and end the recording and use the dedicated photo/video section of the application to watch what you’ve shot right after you have landed. No cables, no SD card, no PC required. Everything has already been sent and sorted in your smartphone/tablet so that can watch your performance instantly. And for users interested in shooting a large quantity of video without using their smartphone/tablet memory, a USB plug is located inside the AR.Drone 2.0 for easy USB recording. Shoot as much as you want and share easily on Youtube or Picasa once you are done thanks to the embedded sharing options of the application.

THE FLIP: A unique acrobatic move available exclusively for the AR.Drone 2.0. Press a button and launch this impressive barrel roll as you are flying. The embedded navigation system of the AR.Drone 2.0 will automatically recover so that any new pilot can enjoy this new move!

ABSOLUTE CONTROL PILOTING MODE: A brand new and exclusive piloting mode patented by Parrot only for the AR.Drone 2.0. The Absolute Control piloting mode will make the life of all beginners easier by only using your device position as a point of reference. The result is simple: whatever the direction the front of the AR.Drone 2.0 is facing you’ll just have to tilt your Smartphone is a direction to see the AR.Drone 2.0 fly toward it. A beginner pilot can now become an expert in 5 minutes.

HIGHER AND FASTER: The AR.Drone 2.0 provides a unique stability thanks to its embedded sensors and navigation system. Any movement not solicited by the pilot will be automatically corrected by the AR.Drone 2.0 to maintain a perfectly still position in the air while you are not controlling it. Push it, put it in windy condition (up to 15 m/h), and it won’t move an inch until YOU decide to make it move. Thanks to its new pressure sensors the AR.Drone 2.0 will grant this automatic stability even further by making sure it remains stable whatever the altitude. You’ll have no excuse not to try your most daring pilot tricks high in the air!

A 12 month Parrot manufacturer’s warranty provides cover for defective parts and workmanship, subject to proof of purchase, but clearly does not include damage in use. A full range of replacement parts are available separately. Parrot Technical Support can offer advice, or assistance following a serious crash. Telephone: 08444 722360, or email: technical.uk@parrot.com

TECHNICAL DETAILS
 *  VIDEO - HD Camera: 720p 30fps; Wide angle lens: 92 degree diagonal; H264 encoding base profile; Low latency streaming; Video storage on the fly with remote device or with USB 2.0 key; JPEG photo capture (720p)
 *  MECHANICAL DESIGN - 3 cell 1,000 mAH LiPo rechargeable battery; High pitch propeller for great maneuverability; 4 brushless inrunner motors with micro ball bearing and rare earth magnets, 14.5 watt & 28,500 rpm when hovering; Self-lubricating bronze bearings, tempered steel proper shafts; Low noise Nylatron gears for 8.625 propeller shafts; Emergency stop controlled by software; Fully reprogrammable motor controller; Water resistant electronic motor controller ; Foam to isolate the inertial center from the engine’s vibrations; EPP hull; Carbon fiber tubes, 380g with outdoor hull, 420g with indoor hull; High grade 30% fiber charged nylon plastic parts; Liquid Repellent Nano-Coating on ultrasound sensors; Fully repairable: all parts and instructions for repairing are available on Parrot website
 *  ELECTRONICS & SENSORS - 16Hz 32 bit ARM Cortex A8 processor with 800MHz video DSP TMS320DMC64x; 16bit DDR2 RAM at 200MHz; 8 MIPS AVR CPU per motor controller; Wi-Fi b/g/n; 3 axis accelerometer +/- 50mg precision; 3 axis gyroscope 2000 degree/second precision; Pressure sensor +/- 10 Pa precision (80cm / 2.6 feet at sea level); 60 fps vertical QVGA camera for ground speed 
 * 



SAFETY WARNING
n/a

BOX CONTAINS


1 x Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 Quadricopter supplied ready-to-fly
1 x Indoor Hull 
1 x Orange/Blue Outdoor Hull 
1 x 1,000mAh Rechargeable Lithium Polymer Flight Battery 
1 x Mains Charger 
1 x Multilingual European Instruction Manual 


See more
feature_bullets: The Parrot AR.Drone 2.0 is an advanced ready-to-fly Wi-Fi controlled quadricopter, suitable for operation indoors or outside
Steer the AR.Drone 2.0 by tilting a Smartphone backwards or forwards, left or right and autopilot to take off, hover and land
Get high definition live streaming directly to your Smartphone or Tablet screen, plus a recording facility and precision control
Includes a high capacity lightweight lithium polymer battery for up to 15 minute flights, plus a mains charger with international adaptors
The AR.Drone 2.0 requires a compatible Smartphone or Tablet for operation (not included). See the Parrot website for current compatibility
